bio.title: Who I Am
bio.intro: I'm a software engineer with {years} years of professional experience, focusing on building scalable and maintainable web applications.
bio.motivation: I'm passionate about creating software that solves real problems and delivers exceptional user experiences. I enjoy working at the intersection of technology and creativity.
bio.approach: My development approach emphasizes clean code, thoughtful architecture, and attention to detail. I believe in building systems that are not just functional, but also maintainable and adaptable to future needs.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: Where I've worked and what I've done

job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Working on full-stack web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and Java-based backend systems. Collaborating in cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions for various clients.

degree.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
degree.description: Core studies included algorithms, data structures, software engineering principles, database systems, and web development. Completed coursework in both theoretical computer science and practical application development.

cta.title: Interested in My Skills?

SkillsPage.title: Skills & Expertise
SkillsPage.subtitle: A comprehensive overview of my technical capabilities
SkillsPage.intro: With a focus on full-stack development, I've cultivated expertise in a diverse range of technologies. My approach emphasizes adaptability and continuous learning, allowing me to select the right tools for each unique project requirement.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building responsive, accessible, and performant user interfaces is my specialty. I create engaging web experiences with modern frameworks and libraries.

frameworks.title: Frameworks & Libraries
frameworks.react: Component-based UI development with hooks, context, and state management
frameworks.nextjs: Server-side rendering, static site generation, and optimized React applications
frameworks.angular: Enterprise-grade applications with TypeScript and component architecture

styling.title: Styling & UI
styling.tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development with responsive design
styling.styledComponents: Component-level styles with CSS-in-JS for dynamic theming

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Creating robust server-side applications with focus on performance, security, and scalability.

node.nodejs: Building scalable network applications with event-driven architecture
node.express: Fast, unopinionated web framework for robust API development
node.bun: Modern JavaScript runtime with enhanced performance for server-side applications

java.core: Object-oriented programming with strong type system and platform independence

database.description: Designing and implementing efficient data storage solutions with focus on data integrity and query performance.
